text: I am a certified HubSpot developer having experience with customizing HubSpot templates.

Yes, I have experience with HubSpot marketplace app.  please check one of my HubSpot app <https://devpost.com/software/easy-e-sign-app-automate-hellosign-with-HubSpot?ref_content=my-projects-tab&ref_feature=my_projects>

Hi all! My growing agency is adding a full-time web developer to the team. We are doing some cool work in HubDB and would love to get someone on board who has experience and wants to do more. Check out the listing and feel free to message me if you have any questions. <https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/3342201114/?refId=NUOoyzR9T6CXQxD1uq9pjw%3D%3D>

Thank you!
